name: Scary Evil Creepy Teacher 3D
description:
Adventure Begins Now! Scary Teacher is worst evil creature in Horror Creepy School. Now she is also located as your neighbor.
Stay away from creepy scary mysterious teacher in scary school. Keep an eye on her to know what your creepy teacher is planning next prank for you, so you can spoil her pranks attempts on you.You are Genius Prankster, So prank scary teacher in different classrooms and also in neighbor house. Scary Evil Teacher game is have smooth and easy controls & High quality 3D graphics. Everyone is scared of creepy teacher, Make sure she does not catch you in school. Enter teacher house and explore its history. Find tricky ways to prank her. Perform Interesting missions like traps, escape, hide & seek, to reveal her scary secrets.
